BoolFlag.Name: SuppressStartupBanner
BoolFlag.Description: The /NOLOGO option prevents display of the copyright message and version number.

BoolFlag.Name: IgnoreAllDefaultLibraries
BoolFlag.Description: The /NODEFAULTLIB option tells the lib to remove one or more default libraries from the list of libraries it searches when resolving external references.

BoolFlag.Name: UseUnicodeResponseFiles
BoolFlag.Description: Use UNICODE Response Files : Instructs the project system to generate UNICODE response files when spawning the librarian. Set this property to 'Yes' when files in the project have UNICODE paths.

BoolFlag.Name: LinkLibraryDependencies
BoolFlag.Description: Specifies whether or not library outputs from project dependencies are automatically linked in.

BoolFlag.Name: TreatLibWarningAsErrors
BoolFlag.Description: /WX causes no output file to be generated if lib generates a warning.

EnumFlag.Name: TargetMachine
EnumFlag.Description: The /MACHINE option specifies the target platform for the program.
